rules.text: This is not a generalist server and is destined to people with a interest in cartography and geospatial. Please do register only if it is the case. Thanks for specifying this interest in the form at the next step to get accepted on the server.
This server is harassment-free and is a safe space for everyone.
Direct advertising for commercial products must remain exceptional.

Bots or similar accounts (posting regular automatic or semi-automatic content) are accepted as long as the topic is related to the server's topic, and are required to be set as "unlisted" (see account preferences after creation).
